
## ``hc_add_series.geo_json``
hc_add_series for geo_json & geo_list objects

#### Description 

hc_add_series for geo_json & geo_list objects

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
## S3 method for class 'geo_json'
hc_add_series(hc, data, type = NULL, ...)
## S3 method for class 'geo_list'
hc_add_series(hc, data, type = NULL, ...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* ``data``: A geo_json or geo_list object.
* ``type``: Type of series. Can be ’mapline’, ’mapoint’.
* ``...``: Arguments defined in http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#chart.
